attributes.action: Put pressure on the FA to lift the broadcasting ban on live Saturday afternoon matches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people cannot get to football matches on Saturday because of the sheer expense.
We think TV should be allowed to show live matches at the traditional time of 3pm. If these matches are allowed to be shown at this time around the rest of the world, then why can't the Citizens of this country be allowed the same priviledge??
